title: pit63
author: pit63
content: What do you think about mining Flux?Hudge community on discord, price increase, many giveaways, good rewards when holding on wallet zeclore, Flux nodes gives 7% / 30%, staking 7.82% / 8.90%.....

comments.author: Widdop37
comments.body: I can't say about others, they are probably going to say you should stick with Ethereum and Ethereum Classic but the fact is Flux is much more, not that ETH but other proof of work coins, I will choose Flux over Ravencoin, Ergo and ETC. This is just my own decision you are free to make yours.

comments.author: devil2man
comments.body: My first choice when eth will no longer be minable is etc of course there are also other alternatives such as ergo, ravencoin also flux is to keep in mind i have to see the performance of the gpu calibrated for eth if flux it does more profit than etc i will mine it

comments.author: DevFile90
comments.body: Ergo and Ravencoin are no shitcoin, if I have to mine flux for long term hold I would definitely mine Ergo and Ravencoin too, I don't want to put all my eggs in one basket, Flux is very good but mining and holding one coin that's not BTC for over 3 years is a big risk....

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: DevFile90 on September 12, 2022, 07:02:24 AMErgo and Ravencoin are no shitcoin, if I have to mine flux for long term hold I would definitely mine Ergo and Ravencoin too, I don't want to put all my eggs in one basket, Flux is very good but mining and holding one coin that's not BTC for over 3 years is a big risk.... That is the same for every other coin including Ergo and Ravencoin although I agree they are somewhat better,in the longer term you only should keep Bitcoin in your wallet and no altcoins.I do this as although I am mining ETC right now I use pools that gives me payout in Bitcoin,that is the best one can do in these moments where the merge of Ethereum and ending of mining for it is imminent right now,we should all be prepared for some difficult days ahead but that we will pass them and then the sun will rise again for all us crypto lovers.

comments.author: pit63
comments.body: Flux is for me the best project!!!Very solid

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Flux Undergoes Second Halving Event, Price Hits Five-Month Highhttps://beincrypto.com/flux-second-halving-event-price-five-month-high/Just like Bitcoin, Flux halves its block reward every 655,350 blocks. However, since one block is generated approximately every 2 minutes, the halving happens roughly every 2.5 years. The halving event has reduced the block reward from 75 to 37.5 FLUX.It should be noted that Flux only rewards miners with half of the block reward. The other half is split between Masternodes, which means the current mining reward is 18.75 FLUX.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: REQUIREMENTS FOR FLUX MAYHEM DECEMBER 15Requirements for Flux Mayhem:1. motherboard with x8 slots (minimum, ideally x16) gen3 - for each GPU2. 4 CPU cores (threads) per GPU3. RAM = 1.25*GPU_TOTAL_RAM - minimum. Ideally 4*GPU_TOTAL_RAM4. A key indicator of a GPU is the amount of video memory.5. Disks - NVMe + HDD (sizes not yet known)https://t.me/koliamainer/9727

comments.author: mecaser
comments.body: flux is one of the most solid projects from my point of view

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: FluxEdge will change the game! #EaaS will become a staple for all enterprise and entry level compute! You need compute? We got you cover! $Flux #DePIN CloudComputinghttps://twitter.com/dak_flux/status/1734747190566727788FluxCore Public Testing Release Loading...Where Computing Meets Excellence!https://leaderboard.fluxcore.ai/The mining revolution will begin on December 15th.

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: Flux introduces Proof of Useful Work (PoUW) and FluxCore, the future of decentralized computing systems When it comes to Proof of Work projects who truly focus on decentralization, it’s hard to not talk about Flux. NiceHash is very familiar with their projects, and we have also had the co-founder Daniel Keller on several of our podcasts with us discussing the future of Web3, but more importantly, defining what Web3 actually is. Its misuse as a buzzword and trend by many companies, and especially people and companies outside of the crypto space, has led to many misconceptions. You can find out more about what it really means in the podcasts NiceTalk.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Flux Core launched their project.Here is their link https://leaderboard.fluxcore.ai/The excitement was very big, but so far they have only launched alpha version, which will work until the 2nd quarter of 2024, then there will be a beta version, where PoUW mining will possibly be tested. At the moment this platform only supports coin mining, or in simple words it is Nicehash or Fluxhash

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Flux RoadMap 2024: What To Look Out Forhttps://fluxofficial.medium.com/flux-roadmap-2024-what-to-look-out-for-58041d2cd00eSSP Wallet: Beta and BeyondSSP–our open-source, double-signature wallet-key pair built on the BIP48-Multi Sg design is already in open beta (limited to 100 users for iOS and Android each). This year, we’ll work on getting SSP out of beta and launching a general release candidate.WordPress Is Here To Stay.FluxEdge Alpha, FluxCore Beta and ...

comments.author: john1010
comments.body: Quote from: pit63 on August 16, 2022, 05:54:15 AM What do you think about mining Flux?Hudge community on discord, price increase, many giveaways, good rewards when holding on wallet zeclore, Flux nodes gives 7% / 30%, staking 7.82% / 8.90%.....Flux (ZEL) is a cryptocurrency project with a unique approach. It combines mining and staking. Here’s what you need to know:Mining: Flux mining is currently profitable, but consider long-term sustainability. It outperforms Ethereum (ETH) now, but trends can change.Rewards:Staking: Flux nodes offer 7% to 30% rewards.Wallet Benefits: Holding Flux in the Zeclore wallet has perks.Staking APY: Flux staking yields 7.82% to 8.90%.Community: Flux has a large Discord community, and the price is rising.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: FluxCore Beta with PoUW will launch fully on March 29Then there will be income for AI from powerful video cards...What will be better...several 4070 or one 4090 in Riga? Answer: one 4090Developers say that there will also be top-end AMD video cards... only they will mostly be used not for working with AI... but for rendering...Top hardware builds for AI and rendering can be found here https://leaderboard.fluxcore.aihttps://t.me/koliamainer/10271

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Flux v5.9.0 It is now possible to store your application backup on FluxDrive for free!Each user can use up to a total 10GB of storage on FluxDrive to store their application backups.These backups only show up/are available to download and restore from FluxOS UI and in future in Flux Cloud, they do not show up in Flux Drive and do not use personal accounts storage of Flux Drive.Restoring is possible only to nodes that are updated to this latest 5.9.0 version.UI fixes and improvementshttps://github.com/RunOnFlux/flux/releases/tag/v5.9.0

comments.author: safar1980
comments.body: ALPHAFluxEdge has been in closed ALPHA since March 29th, undergoing rigorous testing and improvements.Today, we're excited to officially announce its release date to the public - June 26, 2024!What does this mean and what can you expect? Let's dive in!

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Quote from: safar1980 on June 06, 2024, 10:49:03 AMALPHAFluxEdge has been in closed ALPHA since March 29th, undergoing rigorous testing and improvements.Today, we're excited to officially announce its release date to the public - June 26, 2024!What does this mean and what can you expect? Let's dive in!Is there any different between Flux and FluxEdge? Because I saw the Op and made research on the project and in coinsmarketcap, I saw that the project is doing well. And the price is $1.01 so I don't know which one you are talking about is it the same project? Though it is a good news to launch memecoin. And if your project was close and now reopen again then it is also a good news and I e thing is to maintain project for long term and I think the relaunching of the project will last. I have not used and was not aware of the project so I not have any good input for now unless you explain where you are launching the project. Is it in exchange or in the ecosystem. June 26 is just hear. Waiting to see the launch date. Please update us.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Flux (FLUX) - FluxAI Beta Release - 20 Aug 2024Flux is launching its FluxAI Beta. It runs on their advanced decentralized network, FluxEdge. This event lets businesses and consumers test out new AI tools. If successful, it could draw significant attention and new clients to Flux. Increased use and demand for services can lead to a higher FLUX token price.https://www.tradingview.com/news/coinmarketcal:22e5b756c094b:0-flux-flux-fluxai-beta-release-20-aug-2024/
